Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: He imana vali'o! Tuhadi ja'idada ate tuhadi aulada tuhanu alaha de yada tom vajhi'am na kara deve. Ate jihare ajiha karanage tam uha ghate vica paina vale loka hana

Ate asim jihara kujha tuhanu dita usa vicom kharaca karo. Isa tom pahilam ki tuhade vicom kise di mauta a jave. Phira uha akhanage ki he sade palanahara! Tusim mainu kujha hora mauka ki'um na dita. Tam ki maim dana karada ate bhale lokam vica samila ho janda
Ate alaha kade vi kise prani nu jadom usa da samam pura hom jave, mauka nahim dida. Alaha janada hai, jo tusim karade ho
